skillList.skillDesc: The Minigun is capable of sustained rapid fire. Firing for long periods causes the Minigun to overheat, rendering it inoperable for a few seconds.

skillTiers.tierDesc: Put a little lead in the air and see what falls over.

skillList.skillDesc: Occasionally, Moze's and Iron Bear's shots will deal additional Incendiary Damage and won’t consume ammo.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Every 8 shots does not consume ammo
Bonus Incendiary Damage: +2.25%

Every 7 shots does not consume ammo
Bonus Incendiary Damage: +4.50%

Every 6 shots does not consume ammo
Bonus Incendiary Damage: +6.75%

Every 5 shots does not consume ammo
Bonus Incendiary Damage: +9.00%

Every 4 shots does not consume ammo
Bonus Incendiary Damage: +11.25%

skillList.skillDesc: Adds a manned turret to the back of Iron Bear.

skillTiers.tierDesc: Fasten your seatbelt, it's going to be a bumpy ride.

skillList.skillDesc: Moze's currently equipped weapon gains a stacking bonus to Magazine Size and Decreased Heat Per Shot for every piece of equipped gear that has a matching manufacturer.
Minigun deals more damage as heat increases, and can be fired for longer before overheating.
Increases Moze and Iron Bear’s Incendiary Damage.
After Moze scores a Critical Hit, she regenerates ammo for a few seconds.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Ammo Regeneration: +5% of Magazine
Redistribution Duration: 3 seconds

skillList.skillDesc: While moving, Moze's Handling, Weapon Swap and Mode Switch Speed are increased.
The Salamander is a flamethrower that deals Incendiary Damage to enemies at close range. Though the Salamander has infinite ammo, it drains Fuel with use.
Minigun fires Cryo rounds which reduce Heat Gain and Fuel Drain, but deal reduced damage.
Moze can sprint and shoot at the same time.

skillTiers.tierDesc: I don't want any messages saying "I'm holding my position.”

skillList.skillDesc: Moze gains increased Fire Rate and Critical Hit Damage.
Reduces Salamander’s Fuel Drain. Additionally, Iron Bear’s Movement Speed is increased after damaging an enemy with Salamander.
Minigun fires Explosive Rounds that deal increased Splash Damage, but its Fire Rate is decreased.
Increases Moze's Magazine Size.
Equipping two of the same Weapons on Iron Bear increases the damage they deal.
Salamander now deals Corrosive Damage. Additionally, Salamander’s Melt Damage is increased.
Moze gains infinite ammo for a few seconds after exiting Iron Bear.

skillTiers.tierDesc: Some for the Road Duration: 5 seconds

skillList.skillDesc: Moze gains increased Gun Damage as her magazine empties. The less ammo there is remaining, the greater the increase. If Moze has a COV gun equipped, she gains Gun Damage as her gun's heat increases.
The Salamander burst-fires 3 projectiles with increased Fuel Drain, the first of which leaves a large Incendiary area.
Moze constantly regenerates ammo for her currently equipped weapon.
The V-35 is a semi-automatic grenade launcher. Its grenades are not affected by Moze’s equipped grenade mod.

skillTiers.tierDesc: For when the V-34 just isn't enough.

skillList.skillDesc: Whenever Moze deals Splash Damage, she deals bonus Incendiary Damage.
Firing Iron Bear Weapons drains less Fuel. Killing an enemy while Iron Bear is active increases Fuel. This skill has diminishing returns.
Kill Skill. Killing an enemy reduces Moze’s remaining Action Skill Cooldown Time. This skill has diminishing returns.
Direct hits with the V-35 deal increased damage.
Whenever Moze deals Splash Damage, there is a chance to add ammo to her currently equipped weapon’s magazine, with a smaller chance to return a grenade.
All Splash Damage dealt by Moze has a chance to double in size.

skillTiers.tierDesc: +3% chance to double Splash Damage Radius
+6% chance to double Splash Damage Radius
+9% chance to double Splash Damage Radius
+12% chance to double Splash Damage Radius
+15% chance to double Splash Damage Radius

skillList.skillDesc: Iron Bear gains additional armor and increased Maximum Fuel.
The Vanquisher Rocket Pod is a rocket launcher capable of rapid-firing volleys of unguided explosive rockets.

skillTiers.tierDesc: If you want guidance, get a sherpa. If you want explosions, get a Vladof.

skillList.skillDesc: Occasionally, the V-35 fires a Singularity Grenade that pulls in nearby enemies before exploding.
Moze’s grenades have a chance to score a Critical Hit, dealing greatly increased damage. Sources of Critical Hit Damage do not affect grenade Critical Hits.

After Moze exits Iron Bear, it will remain deployed in place for a short time. While Auto Bear remains active, it will target and attack nearby enemies until its duration ends, then it will charge at an enemy and self-destruct.

The Vanquisher Rocket Pod now fires homing rockets and has increased Reload Speed. Hold down F and aim at enemies to designate up to 6 targets. Releasing Fire Button launches a volley of homing rockets at the designated targets.
The V-35’s Reload Speed is greatly increased and it now fires a 5-round burst.
Whenever Moze damages an enemy with a thrown grenade, for every enemy hit, she restores a portion of her missing health.

skillTiers.tierDesc: Restores +4% of missing health per enemy hit
Restores +8% of missing health per enemy hit
Restores +12% of missing health per enemy hit
Restores +16% of missing health per enemy hit
Restores +20% of missing health per enemy hit

skillList.skillName: Why Can't I Carry All These Grenades?
skillList.skillDesc: Increases Moze’s grenade carrying capacity.
The Vanquisher Rocket Pod deals greatly reduced damage per rocket, but fires in a 6-rocket spread. Additionally, enemies hit by Vanquisher Rocket Pod rockets take increased damage from all sources.
Moze gains the ability to throw grenades while in Fight For Your Life. If she threw a grenade before gaining Second Wind, a grenade is refunded.

skillTiers.tierDesc: The greatest enemy is one with nothing to lose... and a grenade.

skillList.skillDesc: When Moze deals Splash Daamage, her Action Skill Cooldown Rate is briefly decreased.
Instead of a volley of conventional rockets, the Vanquisher Rocket Pod launches a single rocket with a nuclear warhead, dealing massive Radiation Damage.
Whenever Moze deals Gun Damage, there is a chance of a secondary explosion centered on the target.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Secondary Explosion Chance: 20%
Secondary Explosion Damage: 75% of Gun Damage

skillList.skillDesc: The Railgun fires electrified high-velocity projectiles that deal Shock Damage.

skillTiers.tierDesc: It's like a bullet, only bigger. And faster. And wrapped in lightning.

skillList.skillDesc: Whenever Moze reloads, she loses a small portion of her health and grants additional Incendiary Damage to her and her allies’ rounds for a few seconds.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Current Health Removed: 1.0%
Bonus Incendiary Damage: +3.0% of gun damage dealt
Selfless Vengeance Duration: 5 sec

Current Health Removed: 2.0%
Bonus Incendiary Damage: +6.0% of gun damage dealt
Selfless Vengeance Duration: 5 sec

Current Health Removed: 3.0%
Bonus Incendiary Damage: +9.0% of gun damage dealt
Selfless Vengeance Duration: 5 sec

Current Health Removed: 4.0%
Bonus Incendiary Damage: +12.0% of gun damage dealt
Selfless Vengeance Duration: 5 sec

Current Health Removed: 5.0%
Bonus Incendiary Damage: +15.0% of gun damage dealt
Selfless Vengeance Duration: 5 sec

skillList.skillDesc: Iron Bear gains a bubble shield that reduces damage taken. The shield deactivates if it sustains too much damage, reactivating after a short cooldown.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
20% Iron Bear Max Health added as Shields
Bubble Recharge Delay: 5 sec

skillList.skillDesc: While Moze’s shields are active, she gains Damage Reduction and increased Gun Damage.
Railgun now fires superheated rounds that deal Incendiary Damage, but have increased Fuel Drain per shot.
For each stack of Drowning in Brass, Moze’s Fire Rate is reduced, but Gun Damage is increased for both her and her allies.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Moze Fire Rate: -0.5% per stack
Gun Damage: +4.0% per stack
Max Drowning In Brass Stacks: 3
Drowning In Brass Duration: 15 seconds

Moze Fire Rate: -1.0% per stack
Gun Damage: +8.0% per stack
Max Drowning In Brass Stacks: 3
Drowning In Brass Duration: 15 seconds

Moze Fire Rate: -1.5% per stack
Gun Damage: +12.0% per stack
Max Drowning In Brass Stacks: 3
Drowning In Brass Duration: 15 seconds

Moze Fire Rate: -2.0% per stack
Gun Damage: +16.0% per stack
Max Drowning In Brass Stacks: 3
Drowning In Brass Duration: 15 seconds

Moze Fire Rate: -2.5% per stack
Gun Damage: +20.0% per stack
Max Drowning In Brass Stacks: 3
Drowning In Brass Duration: 15 seconds

skillList.skillDesc: A portion of Moze’s health is Reserved and cannot be restored, but her Maximum Shield is increased by the same amount.

skillTiers.tierDesc: +20% Max Health Reserved and Added to Max Shields
+40% Max Health Reserved and Added to Max Shields
+60% Max Health Reserved and Added to Max Shields

skillList.skillDesc: Moze’s Maximum Shield is increased, and she gains resistance to Shock Damage.
The Bear Fist is a pneumatic-driven fist that deals massive damage to a single target at close range.

skillTiers.tierDesc: Vladof supports the right to bear armored bear arms.

skillList.skillDesc: When Railgun hits an enemy, it chains to nearby enemies, dealing reduced Shock Damage to more targets.
Entering Iron Bear causes Moze’s and her allies’ shields to immediately begin recharging at an increased Shield Recharge Rate.
Whenever Moze scores a Critical Hit, she deals bonus Incendiary Damage.

skillTiers.tierDesc: Bonus Incendiary Damage: +10% of Damage Dealt

skillList.skillDesc: Whenever Bear Fist hits an enemy, it deals random bonus Elemental Damage to that enemy and all enemies nearby.
Railgun now fires a specialty round that deals reduced damage and explodes after a short delay. Railgun shots have reduced Fuel Drain and the Magazine Size is increased.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Railgun Damage: -50%
Fuel Drain: -50%
Magazine Size: +2
Converts to Corrosive Damage

skillList.skillDesc: Moze’s Shield Recharge Delay is reduced, and her Shield Recharge Rate is increased.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Railgun Damage: -50%
Fuel Drain: -50%
Magazine Size: +2
Converts to Corrosive Damage

Railgun Damage: -50%
Fuel Drain: -50%
Magazine Size: +2
Converts to Corrosive Damage

Railgun Damage: -50%
Fuel Drain: -50%
Magazine Size: +2
Converts to Corrosive Damage

skillList.skillDesc: Moze’s Gun Damage is increased depending on how low her health is. The lower her health, the greater the increase.
Instead of punching, Bear Fist now launches its fist forward and grabs enemies at greatly increased range, dealing Shock Damage and pulling them back to Iron Bear.

Kill Skill. After killing an enemy, Moze gains a stack of Phalanx Doctrine. For every stack of Phalanx Doctrine, Moze’s Maximum Shield and Gun Damage are increased. Each stack lasts 30 seconds. There is no stack limit.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Max Shields: +3.0% per stack
Gun Damage: +2.0% per stack
Phalanx Doctrine Duration: 30 seconds

Max Shields: +6.0% per stack
Gun Damage: +4.0% per stack
Phalanx Doctrine Duration: 30 seconds

Max Shields: +9.0% per stack
Gun Damage: +6.0% per stack
Phalanx Doctrine Duration: 30 seconds

Max Shields: +12.0% per stack
Gun Damage: +8.0% per stack
Phalanx Doctrine Duration: 30 seconds

Max Shields: +15.0% per stack
Gun Damage: +10.0% per stack
Phalanx Doctrine Duration: 30 seconds

skillList.skillDesc: Whenever Moze scores a Critical Kill, her shields immediately begin recharging.
Bear Fist is now capable of sustained rapid fire punching. Additionally, Bear Fist has reduced Fuel Drain and deals Bonus Shock Damage with each hit.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Shock Damage: +19% of damage dealt
Fuel Drain: -40%

skillList.skillDesc: Whenever Moze’s shield is fully depleted, she instantly restores a portion of her shield, and her Gun Damage is increased for a short time. This skill can only trigger after Moze’s shields have fully recharged.

skillTiers.tierDesc:
Restores: +40% of Max Shield
Tenacious Defense Duration: 30 seconds
Gun Damage: +30%
